sections.text: You stand at the moss‑covered gates of Asterfall Forest, a place whispered about in every tavern from here to the coast. Deep within lies the Lost Lantern, an artifact said to reveal hidden truths. The wind carries a faint glow between the trees, almost inviting you in.

options.description: Enter the forest and follow the strange glow.
Circle around the forest edge to search for a safer path.

consequence.text: You take a moment to breathe and prepare yourself.

sections.text: The glow leads you to a fork in the path. To the left, you hear rushing water. To the right, the glow intensifies, pulsing like a heartbeat.

options.description: Head toward the sound of water.
Follow the pulsing glow deeper into the woods.

consequence.text: The air grows heavy and draining as you push forward.

sections.text: You find an old hunter’s trail. It’s quiet—too quiet. A set of fresh tracks leads into a thicket, while the trail itself continues toward a rocky ridge.

options.description: Investigate the fresh tracks.
Stay on the trail toward the ridge.

sections.text: You reach a shimmering river. A stone bridge crosses it, but beneath the water you spot something glowing faintly. The current looks strong.

options.description: Cross the bridge safely.
Dive into the river to investigate the glow.

consequence.text: The icy current slams into you as you dive.

sections.text: The glow leads you to a clearing where the Lost Lantern floats above an ancient pedestal. As you approach, shadowy figures rise from the ground, blocking your path.

options.description: Attempt to speak to the shadowy figures.
Charge forward and grab the Lantern.

consequence.text: The shadows lash out as you rush past them.

sections.text: The tracks belong to a massive stag with silver antlers. It watches you calmly, then bows its head as if offering guidance.

options.description: Follow the stag.

consequence.text: A soothing warmth surrounds you as you follow the creature.

options.description: Retreat back to the trail.

sections.text: The ridge overlooks the entire forest. From here, you spot a beam of light piercing the canopy far below—the Lantern’s location.

options.description: Climb down toward the beam of light.
Search the ridge for useful supplies.

sections.text: You cross safely and find a quiet grove. In the center lies a stone tablet with ancient runes. As you touch it, the forest shifts around you, revealing a hidden path.

options.description: Take the hidden path.
Return to the riverbank.

sections.text: The current pulls you under. You grasp the glowing object—it’s a shard of the Lantern. With it, you break free and surface, gasping.

options.description: Use the shard to track the Lantern.
Rest on the riverbank to recover.

consequence.text: You catch your breath and regain some strength.

sections.text: The shadows pause. One steps forward and speaks: “Only the worthy may claim the Lantern. Prove your intent.”

options.description: Declare your noble intentions.
Attempt to deceive them.

consequence.text: The shadows recoil in anger at your deception.

sections.text: You rush forward, but the shadows overwhelm you. The forest fades into darkness. Your quest ends here.
The stag leads you to a hidden glade where the Lantern rests peacefully. No guardians, no traps—just destiny.
You find a sturdy rope and a small vial of healing herbs. These may prove useful later.

options.description: Head toward the beam of light.
Explore deeper along the ridge.

sections.text: As you rest, the forest grows eerily silent. A whisper urges you to rise—the Lantern calls.

options.description: Follow the whisper.
Ignore it and continue resting.

sections.text: The shadows bow and part, allowing you to approach. You grasp the Lantern, and its light fills you with clarity. You have proven worthy.
Your deception is uncovered instantly. The shadows close in, and your journey ends in silence.
You discover an ancient watchtower. Inside, a mural depicts the Lantern’s creation and its purpose—to guide lost souls to truth.

options.description: Return to the forest to seek the Lantern.
Stay and study the mural further.

consequence.text: The tower collapses unexpectedly as you linger too long.
